class  Util::InterfaceAllocator

class  Util::ByteAllocator
 ByteAllocator of fixed size objects with cache for fast allocation (thread unsafe)A list registers freed blocks until a given theshold. Allocation tries to found a block in the list before using standard allocation. Deallocation puts a block in the list until list size is equal to threshold. At that time normal deallocation is done. We can define a new allocator of cells: More...

class  Util::Allocator< T >
 Allocator of typed objects with cache for fast allocation (thread unsafe)A list registers freed objects until a given theshold. Allocation tries to found a block in the list before using standard allocation. Deallocation puts a block in the list until list size is equal to threshold. At that time normal deallocation is done. The Util namespace contains definitions to port the library onto an operating system.
